name: SOP violation detection
desc: Including live streaming, mask detection using YOLOv5, orthogonal top view projection, generation of static and animated heatmaps.

name: Afloat
desc: Explore the HCI design journey for Afloat, a conceptual application tackling post-Covid social and mental health challenges for LUMS students, focusing on user interface design.

name: G23-LUMS-APP
desc: A University Portal Designed for Lahore University of Management Sciences.

name: Netflix Recommendation System
desc: Suggestions based on latest watch and explore recommended genres, utilizing a robust recommendation system enriched by Exploratory Data Analysis and ML insights.

name: Analysis of Audio Recordings
desc: Comprehensive methodology for audio sentiment analysis using natural language processing and machine learning.

name: Cozmo's Star Wars
desc: Integrate computer vision for character recognition, ChatGPT for storytelling, and user queries to enhance Cozmo's interactive abilities in the Star Wars universe.

name: Detecting Fake Tweets
desc: Detecting fake tweets on Twitter using ML techniques. Explore user profiles, analyze tweet patterns, and leverage ensemble modeling for accurate classification.

name: Compiler-Optimizations
desc: Implementation of 3 different compiler optimization techniques based on three Research Papers.
